channel.title: BIIIG stat problem. =/
channel.description:
1. You know the stats come as a top half and a bottom half when you look at them and the top half raises/lowers when you drink beers etc.? the top half constantly stays at 1 'til you log out and in. How can I fix this?
2. How do I change people's stats? When I change their character file it goes back when you log on to that character.
3. How can I set people's initial stats to a certain amount?
4. How can I change the rate levels grow at?

item.title: BIIIG stat problem. =/
item.dc:creator: @IP1 IP
item.description:
@IP1 wrote:

Umm, well if this a big problem, and you dont know the code, you could download a perfectly good server here

Read full topic

item.title: BIIIG stat problem. =/
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

[quote=“killah246, post:5, topic:90799”][quote author=Surfingpikachao link=topic=132461.msg1281173#msg1281173 date=1178559287]
ok, I just mainly wanted the first and second ones done so if anyone can help… whisper rep++ whispers WHAT? I SAID NOTHING!
[/quote]

:@
You cant rep++
So don’t say you can
Do not SPEAK about repping
Reported[/quote]

If you noticed, the rule has been changed - its been simplified to no asking for rep. But still, even if you’re willing to rep someone for their help, please don’t use it as an incentive - that’s not what its there for.

Read full topic
